rows.label: qst00100102_msg0001
rows.name:
Salvaging is so cool,
mo... Time just flies by
when I'm watching, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0002
rows.name:
Momo...? I feel like I'm forgetting
something... or maybe not...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0003
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]MOMOMO! I forgot it's time
to change shifts, mo!!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0004
rows.name:
Today's the 1000th time I'm
late, mo... Kebikebi is going
to be super angry, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0005
rows.name: M-momomo...!!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0006
rows.name:
Rimurimu was so busy watching
salvaging, I forgot my tummy
was rumbling, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0007
rows.name:
Ugh... I can't move another step,
mo... It's my fate to become a
dried-up husk here, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0008
rows.name:
Will you help poor Rimurimu, mo?
What a kind person you are, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0009
rows.name:
If I could just eat a Nopopon
Roll from Honeycomb Sweets... I
think I could keep going, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0010
rows.name: Please, mo... I'll be waiting, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0101
rows.name:
To get up from here, I have
to eat a Nopopon Roll, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0102
rows.name:
You can buy them at Honeycomb Sweets
in the Central Exchange, but Rimurimu
can't walk another step, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0201
rows.name: Momo! Momomomo!!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0202
rows.name:
Yay, mo! A Nopopon Roll,
mo! Time to eat...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0203
rows.name:
No! This is terrible, mo!
I'm in a pickle, mo!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0204
rows.name:
I was so hungry I dozed
off, and a Gotsun Krabble
stole my treasure, mo!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0205
rows.name:
The precious, precious
pendant my mother gave
me... I want it back, but...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0206
rows.name: Oh, I have a good idea, mo!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0207
rows.name:
If Rimurimu becomes a salvager
and salvages the Gotsun Krabble,
problem solved, mo!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0208
rows.name:
To become a salvager, maybe
I should start practicing
swimming tomorrow, mo?

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0209
rows.name:
Not swimming practice... you'll
get the pendant for me, mo?

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0210
rows.name:
You gave me a Nopopon Roll
and you'll even find my
pendant... Thank you, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0211
rows.name:
The Gotsun Krabble dived
into the Cloud Sea, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0212
rows.name:
I'll go to work when it's
found, so until then, I won't
eat the Nopopon Roll, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0301
rows.name:
Where did my pendant go that
the Gotsun Krabble took, mo?

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0302
rows.name:
Until it's found, I won't
eat the Nopopon Roll, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0304
rows.name:
Aah... Nopopon Rolls
are delicious, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0305
rows.name:
I-I didn't eat it, mo! I
only ate half of it, mo!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0306
rows.name: ...Mo? You got my pendant back, mo?

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0307
rows.name:
Thank you, mo... Now I can always
remember my mother, mo...

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0308
rows.name:
...Mo! I was so worried about
the pendant, I forgot to change
shifts with Kebikebi, mo!

rows.label: qst00100102_msg0309
rows.name:
I'll hurry to Kebikebi's
place, mo! See you, mo!
